Audio Tools

Professional audio visualization and analysis tools for the web

Client

Open Source Community

Year

2025-12-25

Agency

Personal Project

Role

AudioVisualization

Tech

ReactThree.jsTypeScriptWebGLWeb Audio APIShadersReal-time Processing

A comprehensive collection of web-based audio visualization and analysis applications designed for professionals, developers, and enthusiasts. Built with modern web technologies for real-time browser-based audio processing.

Traditional audio analysis tools require expensive software installations and complex setup procedures. Professional visualization often involves proprietary applications with limited accessibility and platform restrictions. Educational demonstrations of acoustic principles rely on static diagrams that cannot convey dynamic audio relationships.

Audio Tools democratizes access to professional-grade visualization through standard web browsers. The suite transforms audio data into meaningful visual representations, enabling real-time understanding of sound characteristics, stereo imaging, and frequency relationships. Each application processes audio through high-resolution FFT analysis while maintaining 60fps performance across supported devices.

Perfect for audio engineers seeking professional stereo field analysis, creative developers building audiovisual applications, educators demonstrating acoustic principles, and musicians exploring visual interpretations of their work.

Core Features

Audio Reactive Shaders

19 unique WebGL shader effects that respond dynamically to audio frequencies. Features plasma waves, fractals, particle systems, and geometric patterns with real-time audio analysis and smooth transitions between effects.

Professional Goniometer

Stereo field analyzer with phase correlation metering for audio engineers. Provides circular goniometer, Lissajous patterns, and vector scope visualization with real-time mono compatibility monitoring.

3D Cymatics Visualization

Interactive 3D particle system demonstrating cymatic phenomena with up to 20,000 particles. Features multiple pattern algorithms inspired by Chladni plates and harmonic resonance principles.

Cross-Platform Accessibility

Browser-based deployment ensures immediate access without installation requirements. Supports microphone input and audio file processing with responsive design for desktop and mobile devices.

Precise Control Features

Advanced audio processing capabilities with professional-grade precision and real-time responsiveness. Each tool processes audio through 2048-sample FFT analysis with adaptive performance scaling based on device capabilities.

Real-Time Analysis

20-30ms latency with smart buffering

Adaptive Performance

Particle count scaling for device capabilities

Preset Management

Configuration saving and sharing

Tiny Shiny Details

Automatic shape detection identifies Lissajous curves, circles, and ellipses in goniometer displays. Color randomization algorithms generate harmonious palettes for shader effects. Preset management systems enable configuration saving and sharing across sessions.

Performance optimization includes adaptive particle count scaling based on device capabilities. Smart buffering reduces audio latency to 20-30ms typical response times. Responsive controls adapt to screen size while maintaining professional-grade precision.

Who This Is For

Audio Engineers

Seeking professional stereo field analysis tools with precise phase correlation monitoring and visual feedback for mixing and mastering workflows.

Creative Developers

Interested in audiovisual programming, WebGL shader development, and real-time graphics applications for live performances or interactive installations.

Educators & Students

Requiring visual demonstrations of audio physics concepts, frequency analysis principles, and stereo imaging techniques for academic purposes.

Musicians & Artists

Exploring visual interpretation of their music through scientific visualization methods or seeking immersive audiovisual experiences for performance enhancement.

Technical Foundation

Web Audio API

2048-sample FFT analysis with real-time processing

Three.js + WebGL

High-performance 3D graphics and shader effects

React + TypeScript

Responsive interfaces with type safety

Built with modern web technologies optimized for real-time audio processing and high-performance graphics rendering. The modular architecture allows independent deployment of individual tools while maintaining consistent user experience and shared audio processing utilities.

Performance Advantage: Canvas 2D and WebGL rendering engines deliver smooth 60fps performance across supported browsers with professional-grade responsiveness.

Ready to Visualize Your Audio?

Access professional audio visualization tools immediately through your web browser. No installation required.
